Crime Data:
[City of Phoenix Open Data](https://phoenixopendata.com/dataset/crime-data/resource/0ce3411a-2fc6-4302-a33f-167f68608a20?view_id=644b88ef-16b3-497d-9413-2ba3eedfd3c1)

Zip code lat/lon coordinates:
[Free Zip Code Database](http://federalgovernmentzipcodes.us/)
  
Property Data:
[Realtor.com](https://www.realtor.com/research/data)

Phoenix Area Base Map:
[Google Maps Static API](https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/maps-static/intro)

GGMaps:
D. Kahle and H. Wickham. ggmap: Spatial Visualization with ggplot2.
  The R Journal, 5(1), 144-161. URL
  http://journal.r-project.org/archive/2013-1/kahle-wickham.pdf

Weather Data (weather conditions):
[rwunderground API Rpackage](https://github.com/ALShum/rwunderground)
